content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [csv_delimited] 
WITH (
	FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, 
	FORMAT_OPTIONS (
		FIELD_TERMINATOR = N',', 
		STRING_DELIMITER = N'"', 
		FIRST_ROW = 2, 
		USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False, 
		Encoding = N'UTF16'
	), 
	DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec'
)
GO
